question: Some people today prefer to get advice for medical problems from the internet and do not want to visit a doctor. Why is this? Is this a positive or a negative development?
text: In the globalization era, internet usage is constantly on the rise, making several individuals avoid a hospital and solve their well-being problems by searching for some advice. This is undoubtedly a negative development of society, and the upcoming essay will provide the causes and the effects of this issue before proving my point.

Firstly, the first major reason that we ought to consider is that society has a negative attitude towards a physician because it seems to be an enormous concern when people choose to go to the hospital. In other words, going to the hospital is not ensuring that the individual will see the doctor in view of the fact that some cases require an appointment before the treatment. For example, as we can see in several clinics, especially in the case of a dentist, if we desire to have specific health care such as teeth whitening, we ought to make an appointment because the particular dentist would not always available.

Secondly,  an another subject includes solving  health problems by ourselves is not the best choice because it has a terrible effect on our life. In different phrase, it is undeniable that numerous people attempt to heal themselves consequently, they have deteriorated fitness issues. For instance, innumerable advisers believe that mind stabilizers could heal a person who receives the pain from cancer. Thus, few populaces purchase such unusual items without advice from the specialist, leading to coma and even death of a patient.

Lastly, after discussing the rationale given above, I would like to reiterate my point that physical distress gives rise to a delicate situation, which should be dealt with very sensibly hence the primary objective of every human being should be to select a pharmaceutical veteran for this job. Therefore, one should consult a well-educated doctor to prevent any minor ailment from turning into a significant illness and take medicine prescribed by the specialist so that our body can improve quickly.

error_list.error_des: It is unlikely that your sentence needs the article an before another. Consider deleting the article.
